data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Mother: Good morning, daughter! Did ____ sleep ____?
Lisa: Yes, Mom. What ____ we ____ for ____ today?
Mother: I ____ fruit, eggs, and ____ and ____. What ____ you ____ to ____?
Lisa: Milk, please! And a glass of orange juice too.
data.partBlankContent:
Mother: Good morning, daughter! Did y__ sleep we__?
Lisa: Yes, Mom. What a__ we eat___ for brea_____ today?
Mother: I ha__ fruit, eggs, and br___ and but___. What d_ you wa__ to dr___?
Lisa: Milk, please! And a glass of orange juice too.
data.fullContent: Mother: Good morning, daughter! Did you sleep well? Lisa: Yes, Mom. What are we eating for breakfast today? Mother: I have fruit, eggs, and bread and butter. What do you want to drink? Lisa: Milk, please! And a glass of orange juice too.
data.answer: 母亲:早上好，女儿!你睡得好吗? 丽莎:是的,妈妈。我们今天早餐吃什么? 母亲:我吃水果、鸡蛋、面包和黄油。你想喝点什么? 丽莎:牛奶,谢谢!再来一杯橙汁。
